attributes.action: Require transparency on aircraft emissions and atmospheric activity over the UK
attributes.additional_details: People in the UK are increasingly concerned about what is being released into the atmosphere and how it may affect public health and the environment. There is currently no clear transparency framework. Requiring disclosure and independent monitoring would build trust, protect public health, and ensure all activities in our skies are subject to proper oversight.
attributes.background: I want the Government to publish full details of all aircraft emissions and any authorised atmospheric activity in UK airspace. This should include independent monitoring, public reporting, and clear disclosure of any operations that may affect air quality or the environment.

rejection.details:
Aircraft operators fall under the UK Emissions Trading scheme which means they  report on their annual emissions.

More information is available here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/6889f51c76f68cc8414d5b67/ukets01-mrr-general-guidance-for-installations.pdf
